extendedInfo.description: Various FlowThe puzzle game Various Flow is a highly addictive puzzle game with simple, diverse and extensive stages.There is a mode of filling all the screen by connecting the lines with the same colored point and a mode of filling the screen by connecting the points by the order of the number, etc.There are 6 kinds of modes with characteristics and it is composed of 15000 stages.All of this modes and stages can be played for no additional payment!â 6 various modes and 15000 stages are all free ââ Survival Mode âCompete with other players in the whole world how many maps given randomly at a given time you can clearâ Classic Mode âA traditional type of Flow game in a mode of filling 5*5 ~ 9*9 sized boardâ Crazy Mode âA mode containing myriads of  backgrounds with various shapesâ Bridge Mode âBridges in the board allows you to enjoy more difficult as well as interesting â Number Mode âA mode of not simply connecting the same colored points but connecting according to numbers respectively imposed on each point.â Number Bridge Mode âThis the most difficult mode requires connecting points according to the numbers on each point where there are bridges.Flow Free , Flow Line , Connect-All

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: When I open the app all that\'s there is a black screen with an ad at the bottom.
reviews.author: Susan Peacock

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: I played the original but this one made it so much more fun and new modes I never really tried
reviews.author: Latrell Sumner

reviews.title: Pure BS
reviews.comment: I open the game and it goes to this chart and refuses to allow me to press anything & start a Game
reviews.author: Grady Bryant

reviews.title: Ehhhhhh
reviews.comment: This game is like a fake version of \"Flow Free\" but since I finished all the Levels this will do.
reviews.author: Rachelle Kendra

reviews.title: problems
reviews.comment: When I try and open it, it goes to a screen with rankings that\'s blank.  I have yet to be able to play this. Game
reviews.author: Nathaniel Jimenez

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Too much like free flow, but it\'s challenging.
reviews.author: Victoriah Lloyd

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: I played another version of this game that counted how many times you touched the screen and was limited on the variety of games. This one gives you a good variety. Fun to pass time.
reviews.author: Hope von Brincken

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: I really enjoy playing this game. Once I start I can\'t stop!!!
reviews.author: Racheal Lovell

reviews.title: Various Flow
reviews.comment: Great job! Fun game! Gonna let my grandkids play when next I see them!
reviews.author: Rebecca Pico

reviews.title: Froze
reviews.comment: Downloaded because I have completed flow and flow bridges, upon opening the game I could not continue past the start screen. I exited out of the game and tried to reopen it and was told it quit unexpectedly. It has been uninstalled. Using HTC EVO 4G
reviews.author: Chelsea Polk

reviews.title: Super buggy
reviews.comment: I tried this one because I liked \"Flow Free\" so much, but it\'s too buggy for me to keep. I made it to level 50 in no time, all\'s good... then it started getting ticky, wouldn\'t accept my moves, and broke previous moves, as I tried to establish new \"flows.\" So I decided to quit and try again later. Upon exiting the app, I see I\'m only recorded as having completed 10 levels!  I was on level 50! Sorry, but uninstalling. Original Droid RAZR running Jelly Bean.
reviews.author: Jennifer Husted

reviews.title: Best flow game
reviews.comment: I really enjoyed myself with this one. I loved the variety the most  and then the different difficulty levels. Helps turn your mind off. Hope they make another one soon. ;0))))))
reviews.author: Tammy May

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Takes this kind of game to a much higher level. Thanks
reviews.author: Renee Creel

reviews.title: Wont let me play. :(
reviews.comment: Same as others. The game loads, but wont let me start a game. Hopefully gets fixed soon. Will change my rating when it does, I\'m sure. Samsung note 2.
reviews.author: Kristin Kaminski

reviews.title: Lobe it
reviews.comment: I love this game the best free flow ever.....
reviews.author: Nestor Menchaca

reviews.title: Saaaaaad!!
reviews.comment: I was SOO excited when I first found this.. downloaded it and it does nothing. Makes it to the rankings screen where the snow is (not sure why that\'s necessary..?), but it won\'t let me touch anything. It might as well be a screenshot. And I\'m seeing that nobody else with a tablet like mine can either. I\'ve been waiting for an update with a fix for MONTHS now.. am I wasting my time? Should I just give it up and uninstall or is there one coming? 5 stars for the idea.. just wish I could actually play it!
reviews.author: Tessa Nicholson

reviews.title: Please fix!
reviews.comment: Stuck on screen that shows numbers 1-5! Can\'t do anything else! Please fix!
reviews.author: Envisioned Ivy

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: If you like flow games this one adds some good twists. Great time waster
reviews.author: Stephen Warwick

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This is a fun game. It has a few more twist than just regular flow games.
reviews.author: Becky Prater

reviews.title: Cannot get past opening screen
reviews.comment: The music plays but I am unable to tap on any of the options.   Samsung Galaxy Tab 2
reviews.author: De Buhn
